name: Perfect Raizer
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):If you do not have another unit with "Raizer" in its card name on your (VC) or (RC), this unit gets [Power] -2000.
[CONT](VC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +3000 for each card in your soul with "Raizer" in its card name.
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if the number of cards in your soul with "Raizer" in its card name is four or more, this unit gets [Critical] +1.
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), put all rear-guards you have with "Raizer" in its card name into your soul.

name: Infinite Corrosion Form, Death Army Cosmo Lord
effect:
[ACT](VC)[Limit-Break 4](This ability is active if you have four or more damage):[Counter-Blast 2] [Stand] all of your <Nova Grappler> rear-guards. If four or more units [Stand] this way, this unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn. This ability cannot be used for the rest of that turn.
[ACT](VC):[Choose two of your rear-guards with "Death Army" in its card name, and [Rest] them] This unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Beast Deity, Azure Dragon
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):If you have a non-<Nova Grappler> vanguard or rear-guard, this unit gets [Power] -2000.
[AUTO](VC):[Choose a card named "Beast Deity, Azure Dragon" from your hand, and discard it] When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to two of your rear-guards, and [Stand] them.

name: Magician Girl, Kirara
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):[Counter-Blast 2] When this unit's attack hits, if you have a <Nova Grappler> vanguard, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw a card.

name: Hi-powered Raizer Custom
effect: [CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if you have a unit named "Battleraizer" in the back row of the same column as this unit, this unit gets [Power] +8000.

name: Death Army Bishop
effect: [ACT](RC):[Counter-Blast 1] If you have a <Nova Grappler> vanguard, choose up to two of your other rear-guards with "Death Army" in its card name, and [Stand] them. This ability cannot be used for the rest of that turn.

name: Twin Blader
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
